casebody.data:
Steven GRODENSKY
v.
Roger MCLENDON, MD, Duke University Health System, Inc. d/b/a Duke University Medical Center, Associated Health Services, Inc., Duke Medicine Global Support Corporation, The Duke University School of Medicine Research Foundation, and Private Diagnostic Clinic No. 283P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Fred D. Smith, Jr., Attorney at Law, Jeremy Ross Swindlehurst, Attorney at Law, Robert W. Mann, Attorney at Law, for Grodensky, Steven. Mark E. Anderson, Attorney at Law, Joan S. Dinsmore, Attorney at Law, Jacob D. Charles, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for McLendon, Roger (M.D.)

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 30th of August 2018 by Defendant (Roger McLendon, MD) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
